messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Liberty kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/18/02 6:48:39 AM, meembeam@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/18/02 6:48:39 AM, meembeam@... writes:

<< Another great PBS show is "Rough Science". A
group of scientists on an island have to make things such as anti-bacterial
cream, microscope, communications radio, etc. using only a few basic tools
and anything they find on the island.
>>

Cool! "McGyver's Island"!
I'll look for it.
Holly's the one who knows how to use the PBS site.
She probably already knows when it's on, if it's showing here.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Liberty kids
messages.msgSnippet: Kind of like Gilligan s Island meets Survivor , except noone is kicked off. Mary-NY ... _________________________________________________________________
messages.messageBody:
Kind of like "Gilligan's Island" meets "Survivor", except noone is kicked
off.
Mary-NY

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Liberty kids
messages.msgSnippet: We love Liberty Kids too.  Another great PBS show is Rough Science .  A group of scientists on an island have to make things such as anti-bacterial cream,
messages.messageBody:
We love "Liberty Kids" too. Another great PBS show is "Rough Science". A
group of scientists on an island have to make things such as anti-bacterial
cream, microscope, communications radio, etc. using only a few basic tools
and anything they find on the island.

Mary-NY

messages.subject: Liberty kids
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/16/02 1:44:42 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/16/02 1:44:42 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Holly and I were watching Liberty's Kids the other day >>

I think that is a WAY cool show.
Another good History one that Trevor has totally enjoyed, is "Mail Call", all
about military and the history of it...plus the weaponry.
They did medieval weaponry the other night, we loved it!

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
